title: Advanced Mathematics Learner Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Blended Learning and Lesson Study

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational mathematics knowledge and proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Emphasis on collaborative learning through a lesson study model in non-synchronous digital learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete self-directed problem-solving projects at least once a week in blended learning environments.
Through collaborative teacher-learner instructional research, learners can design and validate interdisciplinary problem scenarios at least three times.
Achieve over 80% participation in peer assessment and feedback processes using digital learning tools.
Can classify individual learning patterns into at least three levels through LMS-based learning activity analysis and establish improvement plans.

resources: Integrated Digital Content Library for Mathematics Curriculum

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
